column3: Pre-requisites

column2: Validate Registering an account by providing only the mandatory fields
column3: Open the application in any browser (https://demo.prestashop.com/#/en/front)
column5:
1. Navigate to 'Your Account' menu option at the bottom of 'Home' page
2. Click on 'Create account' option
3. Enter new account information into the mandatory fields (First name, Last name, Email, Password, privacy policy, and data privacy)
4. Click on 'Save' button (ER-1)
column6: 1. User should be logged in, taken to the 'Main' page, and the proper username displayed next to the 'Sign out' button

column2: Validate Registering an account by providing all the fields
column3: Open the application in any browser (https://demo.prestashop.com/#/en/front)
column5:
1. Navigate to 'Your Account' menu option at the bottom of 'Home' page
2. Click on 'Create account' option
3. Enter new account information into the mandatory fields (Social title, First name, Last name, Email, Password, Birthdate, Receive offers, Privacy policy, newsletter, and data privacy)
4. Click on 'Save' button (ER-1)
column6: 1. User should be logged in, taken to the 'Main' page, and the proper username displayed next to the 'Sign out' button

column2: Validate proper alert messages are displayed for all fields
column3: Open the application in any browser (https://demo.prestashop.com/#/en/front)
column5:
1. Navigate to 'Your Account' menu option at the bottom of 'Home' page
2. Click on 'Create account' option
3. Don't fill out any fields
4. Click on 'Save' button (ER-1)
5. Enter information into 'First name', 'Last name' and 'Email' fields
6. Enter less than 8 characters into 'Password' field (ER-2)
7. Enter more than 72 characters into 'Password' field (ER-2)
8. Enter valid Password format
9. Enter 'Birthdate' field
10. Click on 'Save' button (ER-3)
column6:
1. User should receive alert message 'Please fill out this field' for the 'First name' field
2. User should receive alert message 'Enter a password between 8 and 72 characters'

3. The below alert messages should be displayed for the respective fiedls:
1) For 'Email' field,  user should receive alert message 'Please include an '@' in the email address. '(inputed content)' is missing an '@'.' , or receive alert message 'Please enter a part followed by '@'. (inputed content) is incomplete.', or  receive alert message 'Invalid format'
2) For 'Privacy policy', user should receive alert message 'Please check this box if you want to proceed.'
3) For 'data privacy', user should receive alert message 'Please check this box if you want to proceed.'
4) For 'Birthdate' field,  user should receive alert message 'Format should be 05/31/1970.'

column2: Validate different ways of navigating to 'Create an account' page
column3: Open the application in any browser (https://demo.prestashop.com/#/en/front)
column5:
1. Click on 'Sign in' button
2. Click on 'No account? Create on here' option (ER-1)
3. Navigate to 'Your Account' menu option at the bottom of 'Home' page
4. Click on 'Create account' option (ER-1)
column6: 1. User should be taken to 'Create an account' page
